message:
Command `echo "n = int(input())
s = input().strip()

# Count the number of non-empty substrings that are repetitions of one character
count = 0

# For each position in the string, find all substrings starting at that position
# that consist of a single repeated character
i = 0
while i < len(s):
    char = s[i]
    j = i
    # Find the end of the consecutive run of this character
    while j < len(s) and s[j] == char:
        j += 1

    # For this run of length (j - i), we can have substrings of lengths 1 to (j - i)
    # Each of these will be counted directly
    run_length = j - i
    count += (run_length * (run_length + 1)) // 2

    i = j

print(count)" > solution.py` executed with exit code 0.

extras.command:
echo "n = int(input())
s = input().strip()

# Count the number of non-empty substrings that are repetitions of one character
count = 0

# For each position in the string, find all substrings starting at that position
# that consist of a single repeated character
i = 0
while i < len(s):
    char = s[i]
    j = i
    # Find the end of the consecutive run of this character
    while j < len(s) and s[j] == char:
        j += 1

    # For this run of length (j - i), we can have substrings of lengths 1 to (j - i)
    # Each of these will be counted directly
    run_length = j - i
    count += (run_length * (run_length + 1)) // 2

    i = j

print(count)" > solution.py
